text: @realDonaldTrump Donald...try to focus....Coronavirus....Depression-era jobs losses....economy tanking.....give up on protecting things named for traitorous racists.  Just because we rename all things named for traitorous racists does not mean we will not honor you for being a traitorous racist..

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
